imdb.plot outline: Agriculture imagines a world where food production takes place in huge hydroponic farms under the ground. David is the sole operator of a new facility growing a top secret experimental crop that could solve the food crisis. David is a Hand and works for The Farmer - but is The Farmer all he appears to be? Written and directed by Grant Watson and starring Shane Taylor and Tanya Franks - Agriculture is a thrilling Sci-Fi web series.
imdb.title: Agriculture
